EmailTemplate.description: This is the default email invitation template for survey: O&M Portfolio Customer Survey - Borrego Solar - Q1-Q2 2017
EmailTemplate.name: Timba Survey: O&M Portfolio Customer Survey - Borrego Solar ...
EmailTemplate.subject: Please complete this survey: O&M Portfolio Customer Survey - Borrego Solar - Q1-Q2 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued Customers,
We would greatly appreciate your assistance in continually improving our service offering. To that end, below is a link to our Customer Feedback Survey. Please take a few minutes to fill it out to let us know what we are doing well and where we can improve. We use the results of this survey to make fundamental decisions about what services we offer and how we offer them so your candid feedback is appreciated. Please complete this survey at:
%SURVEY_URL%
Kind regards,
Phillip Stephenson Email: pstephenson@borregosolar.com Phone: 978-221-3123 __________________________________________________________________ Surveys Made Easy by Timba Surveys http://sfproducts.altimetrik.com/forums
